effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. This move is super-effective against the water type. The target’s other type will affect damage as usual. If this move’s type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.
